Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Nhimbaloth]{Nhimbaloth}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Lift Nature's Caul]{Lift Nature's Caul}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fearful Feast]{Fearful Feast}

You seek to instill abhorrence and horror in those around you.
name: Abomination Domain
